blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: maybe y'all should stop attacking people?? yes some people are rude and have no rights to talk shit about dnp but you shouldnt...
question: maybe y'all should stop attacking people?? yes some people are rude and have no rights to talk shit about dnp but you shouldnt attack every person for a stupid joke either like i get it you're offended but dan is a grown man who understands these jokes but i see a lot of people insulting my friend who is literally a sweetheart and has said 1 (one) bad thing (a joke) about dan and what you do is just hypocritical..... you tell people not to come for dan but then you come for people in the phandom
answer:
Literally when did I attack anyone.


I’m commenting about the behaviour of several people on twitter. Not any one person in particular. Not to mention that jokes are only jokes if they’re funny. Some people on Twitter are being real assholes, regardless of whether they think they’re joking or not. And I don’t think it’s unreasonable to call out shitty behaviour when you see it.

reblog.comment:
Literally when did I attack anyone.


I’m commenting about the behaviour of several people on twitter. Not any one person in particular. Not to mention that jokes are only jokes if they’re funny. Some people on Twitter are being real assholes, regardless of whether they think they’re joking or not. And I don’t think it’s unreasonable to call out shitty behaviour when you see it.

trail.content_raw:
Literally when did I attack anyone.


I’m commenting about the behaviour of several people on twitter. Not any one person in particular. Not to mention that jokes are only jokes if they’re funny. Some people on Twitter are being real assholes, regardless of whether they think they’re joking or not. And I don’t think it’s unreasonable to call out shitty behaviour when you see it.
trail.content:
Literally when did I attack anyone.


I’m commenting about the behaviour of several people on twitter. Not any one person in particular. Not to mention that jokes are only jokes if they’re funny. Some people on Twitter are being real assholes, regardless of whether they think they’re joking or not. And I don’t think it’s unreasonable to call out shitty behaviour when you see it.

summary: i'm looking at the replies on Dan's Christmas tweet and I'm not seeing any negativity. Could you give us some examples?
question: i'm looking at the replies on Dan's Christmas tweet and I'm not seeing any negativity. Could you give us some examples?
answer:
“(i’m the anon that talked about not seeing negative twitter replies) nevermind i found them and WOW they are bad. Do these people realize that dnp are under no obligation to make pinof 10 at all? Like, this is a privilege.”


.

.

.


See? People are being so entitled. Like fuck, they said it would be in December, what more do y’all want?

reblog.comment:
“(i’m the anon that talked about not seeing negative twitter replies) nevermind i found them and WOW they are bad. Do these people realize that dnp are under no obligation to make pinof 10 at all? Like, this is a privilege.”


.

.

.


See? People are being so entitled. Like fuck, they said it would be in December, what more do y’all want?

summary: dan has really pretty eyes, should be illegal
question: dan has really pretty eyes, should be illegal
answer: I hereby decree that Dan Howell is no longer allowed to have eyes. It is against the law.

blog.name: philshowell
blog.title: was sexuallyambiguousphan
blog.description:
Caitlyn // 22 // she/her // lesbian

Dan's spent a third of his life with Phil and I've spent a third of my life watching them both.

If you're not on mobile: The different colored boxes at the bottom of my sidebar are extra links. Also, you can feed the fish on my blog by clicking a few times anywhere on the background.

tags: which i dont think i technically have a tag for but there you go
this is iconic 2010 phan content right here
i just included like 10 seconds of them talking about the tree in the beginning
because im really unreasonably soft about phil calling it ‘our’ christmas tree
when this video came out before dan technically lived with him
i get that like functionally he lived with him and of course its their tree and they decorated it together
but idk it always makes me soft

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
